Part 1 itch.io link (can play on browser like in Scratch!) : freeezingglacier.itch.io/Sunshine (link exactly correct - beta tested).

You must have played many platformers! Now, you have to play Sunshine! This is a 10-level platformer.

(we are in Sunshine 2 now!)

50+ loves, 50+ favorites and 50+ followers for part 3!!!

Arrow keys to move!

You can wall jump!

Press down arrow to crouch!

Turbowarp link : https://turbowarp.org/601223119
